text: Wugong railway station () is a station on Longhai railway in Wugong County, Xianyang, Shaanxi. ==History== The station was opened in 1936. Formerly known as Pujizhen railway station (), the station was renamed to the current name in 1982. At the same time, The former Wugong railway station, which is west, was renamed to Yanglingzhen railway station (current Yangling railway station). ==References== Category:Railway stations in Shaanxi Category:Stations on the Longhai Railway Category:Railway stations in China opened in 1936
title: Wugong railway station
